With their [[Scientific Ninja Tools]], the user can use three different stored ninjutsu:
* {{translation|'''Whirlwind Shuriken'''|旋風手裏剣}}: The user throws a [[shuriken]] contained with a [[Wind Release]] that releases a gust of wind.
* {{translation|'''Water Ball'''|水球弾}}: The user releases a [[Water Release]] ninjutsu, forming an orb that shoots bullets of water.
* {{translation|'''Lightning Gun'''|雷砲|Raideppō}}: The user releases a [[Lightning Release]] ninjutsu, shooting a beam of electricity.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]'', all three of the stored ninjutsu were separate tilt jutsu. In ''[[Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections]]'', all three became a singular secondary jutsu.
